display_long_description:
# Do you have what it takes to solve mankind's greatest mystery?
When your father passed, you inherited his Light Crystal and decided to embark on a quest to fulfill his life's mission - to find humanity's first civilization.
Determined to prove his doubters wrong and set history straight, you venture out with your loyal companion, Jack, and set course for the unknown.

[media]

This is where your adventure starts, to explore Epyka - a mythological world lost in time. On your journey, you will be tested in both bravery, skill, teamwork and wit in a series of challenges to deem if you are worthy to wander Epyka's mighty halls and uncover its secrets. But thread carefully - beneath lurks an ancient evil, watching your every step.

Are you ready to fulfill your destiny?

# Reviews

- “The lighting effects are gorgeous and add to the mood beautifully, whether we're on the sunny beach of our first island, a  gloomy cave mid-game, or in the molten core of a volcano. Everything  looks great” - Upload VR

- “The team at Singular Perception has crafted a delightful story that guides you as you navigate the beautifully designed mysterious island, tackling its challenges and puzzles” - The VR Realm

# Solve Immersive Puzzles
[media]

# Join together in dreamwork
[media]

# Discover supernatural powers
[media]

# Live through an Intriguing story
[media]

# Fight an epic battle
[media]

Join our **Discord** to discuss the game with other Epykians and hear about future updates! https://discord.gg/x7VraYdUCd
